DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the potential PK interaction between ABT-335, atorvastatin 80 mg and ezetimibe 10 mg when administered concurrently.
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple-Dose Pharmacokinetic Interaction Study Between ABT-335, Atorvastatin and Ezetimibe
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female subjects Clinically significant diseases or disorders Positive screens for drug and alcohol Pregnant or breastfeeding females Any history of surgery(ies) that might interfere with the gastrointestinal motility, pH or absorption
